thread.title: Exeptionelle
thread.title_full: Exeptionelle - Review of Sofitel Paris La Defense, La Defense, France - TripAdvisor

author: Peter_1969_01
title: Exeptionelle
text:
A Luxury Hotel indeed: Here the word Hospitality is not ust a word, everyone working here does everything to make the stay comfortable for every guest.
Friendly welcome, friendly goodbye and in between an impeccable service. The breakfast is especially good, the rooms are comfortable an spacious, the styling elegant - we will return!!
Room Tip: see above: spacious and comfortable rooms, very calm and the beds are very comfortable, too. See more room tips
